segments.text: I'm observing the two children in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've really orchestrated a clever plan for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is using a stool to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is a perfect accomplice, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand already in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate, maybe to catch falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That's quite resourceful of him, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, that stool looks so wobbly and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really tilted backwards, almost ready to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart skips a beat just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so absorbed in their mission, they don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a daring adventure for them, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR
